meanings.sent1: The festivalgoer danced happily at the event.
meanings.sent2: Many festivalgoers gathered to enjoy the music.
meanings.sent3: The festivalgoer wore a funny hat to the festival.
meanings.sent4: She was a festivalgoer, always seeking new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The colorful outfit of the festivalgoer stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: One who enjoys participating in festivals.
meanings.sent1: As a festivalgoer, he loved trying different foods.
meanings.sent2: The group of festivalgoers laughed and sang together.
meanings.sent3: The festivalgoer brought a big smile to every event.
meanings.sent4: She was a dedicated festivalgoer, never missing a celebration.
meanings.sent5: The festivalgoer's enthusiasm was contagious among friends.
